import React from 'react' import './Login.css' import Loginpic from '../../resources/a.png'; import ID from '../../resources/ID.png'; import Password from '../../resources/pass.png'; const Login = () =>{ const history = useHistory() const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: "", password: "" } ) const handleChange = e => { const { name, value} = e.target setUser({ ...user, [name]:value }) } const login = () => { axios.post("http://localhost:3000/Login", user) .then(res => { alert(res.data.message) setLoginUser(res.data.user) history.push("/") }) } return (

MANAGER LOGIN



Forgot Password ? then Sign-up

) } export default Login
